output.sentences: She loved to tell her stories and Uncle Larry loved to listen to her stories.
The children smiled and nodded along while grandma told her stories, they had heard them all before.
They all loved grandma Judy so they didn't mind listening to her stories over and over again.
They just kept smiling along with her.
